article: afghan president hamid karzai came to canada on thursday to thank its people for their military sacrifice in afghanistan and try to convince skeptics about the need to stay involved in his country as opposition to the mission mounts among the candian public .
abstract: president hamid karzai visits canada to shore up support for canadian mission in afghanistan
